smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onActivityCreated appears to be too complex.
The function onUpgrade appears to be too complex.
The function convertObservableConsumer appears to be too complex.
The function convertToStatus appears to be too complex.
The function convertToStatus appears to be too complex.
The function refreshOnTop appears to be too complex.
The function loadOnGap appears to be too complex.
The function set appears to be too complex.
The function add appears to be too complex.
The function updateView appears to be too complex.
The function startElement appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function restoreURLEntities has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function convertToContentAndLinks has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class CachedStatusesSQLiteOpenHelper is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'CachedStatusesSQLiteOpenHelper' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'AbstractMediaFragment' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'AbstractVideoFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'User' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ListModelImpl' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface ListModel is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface PostTweetModel is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.github.moko256.twitlatte.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.View.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.twitlatte.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
twitter4j.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ImageKeyboardEditText.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of FitSystemWindowsLinearLayout.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class AccessToken contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getKeyString
The data class User contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called get400x400ProfileImageURLHttps

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class Media implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Emoji implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Function parameter view is unused.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.
Multi-line else statement was found that does not have braces.These should be added to improve readability
